content: What is the name of the 1962 movie starring Gregory Peck, based on a Pulitzer Prize-winning novel by Harper Lee?

The movie you're referring to is "To Kill a Mockingbird." It was released in 1962 and stars Gregory Peck as Atticus Finch. The novel, written by Harper Lee, won the Pulitzer Prize in 1961 and is considered a classic of modern American literature. The film adaptation was also highly acclaimed and Peck won an Academy Award for his portrayal of Atticus Finch.
